history.text: hi
got any movie suggestions?
hello
I do happen to have a great one :)
I'd like to recommend Bruce Almighty
i will take your recommendation because i have seen the movie and love jim carry my kid have never seen.
It's been a while though would you be interested in telling me a bit about it?
yes it stars Jim Carrey whom I love along with Morgan Freeman and Jennifer Aniston
it's about a reporter that's having a bad time and complains to God so he gets to play God for a week
morgan freeman is one of my absolute favorite actors along with jim carre. Jennifer aniston is a great actor as well. The years have been kind to her..
I love all three of the main actors and actresses too
Didn't they make a sequel to bruce almighty?
do you happen to know why the Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic scores would be so low? They're 48 percent and 46/100 respectively
wow no i wouldn't
i remember all the good critique from the 90s about it i don't know why they would give such a low rating
Evan Baxter is the rival who gets the promotion that causes the breaking point for Jim Carrey's character in the movie
Ah yea that's steve carrell huh?
yes it's Steve Carrell whom I also love...don't know which one I like more between him and Jim Carrey
what do you think about Bruce's use of God-like powers in the movie?
exactly the type of things i'd be doing lol. Jim and steve both did really well bringing out the main characters personality
they both are those kind of slapstick comiedians
one of the reviews actually said "Carrey is hilarious in the slapstick scenes"
haha that's awesome. Who directed?
some of the funny use of powers were when he causes Evan to embarrass himself on the air which gets him fired though
haha yep
I've never heard of the director but his name is Tom Shadyac
i may have to look up some of his other works. I've never heard of him either
the ending of the movie is a pretty nice wrap up for the movie
I think the director did a nice job with that
I can't recall how it ends
Jim Carrey is in the hospital and says a prayer for Jennifer Aniston to find the man she loves and then he gets miraculously healed and starts loving his job, his wife, and his life more

uid1response.feedback: The user left the conversation while I was explaining more on the last part of the document?

uid2response.feedback: Great conversation about a great movie. Thx :)
